standard_crypto.desc: Major institutional adoption (e.g., BlackRock), ETF approval, favorable national regulation.
Tech upgrades, new partnerships, minor bullish sentiment.
Neutral market reports, price updates (e.g. 'Bitcoin hits 30k'), noise.
Minor FUD, unfavorable rumors, exchange maintenance.
Major hacks (> $100M), exchange insolvency (e.g. FTX), strict government bans.

degen_meme.desc: Elon Musk tweet, Tier-1 exchange listing (Binance/Coinbase), viral trend.
Project updates, roadmap releases (nobody cares in meme world).
Rug pull, dev wallet selling, liquidity removed.

conservative_macro.desc: Fed cuts interest rates, QE (Quantitative Easing) starts.
Fed hikes rates, CPI inflation higher than expected, regulatory crackdown.
